title: Police: Man possibly asleep at the wheel slams into pole head-on 6 hours ago
content: SAN ANTONIO - A man driving to work early Saturday morning crashed into a pole.    Authorities were called to the Northwest Loop 410 access road and Fredericksburg Road at about 3:30 a.m. for reports of an accident. Police said a 28-year-old man possibly fell asleep at the wheel and hit a marquee sign head-on. Emergency crews got him out of the vehicle and took him to University Hospital with minor injuries.
